conda_recipe_manager.commands.utils package

Submodules

conda_recipe_manager.commands.utils.print module

File: print.py Description: Provides print utility functions

conda_recipe_manager.commands.utils.print.print_err(*args, print_enabled: bool = True, **kwargs) → None[source]

Convenience wrapper that prints to STDERR :param print_enable: (Optional) Flag to enable printing. Enabled by default.

conda_recipe_manager.commands.utils.print.print_messages(category: MessageCategory, msg_tbl: MessageTable) → None[source]

Convenience function for dumping a series of messages of a certain category :param category: Category of messages to print :param msg_tbl: MessageTable instance containing the messages to print

conda_recipe_manager.commands.utils.print.print_out(*args, print_enabled: bool = True, **kwargs) → None[source]

Convenience wrapper that prints to STDOUT :param print_enabled: (Optional) Flag to enable printing. Enabled by default.
